snippet.title: Nebelmer - Reveal Trailer (English)
snippet.description:
Wishlist Nebelmer now on Steam ! https://store.steampowered.com/app/3134810/Nebelmer/

Discover the unknown land of Nebelmer, a small open world game about exploration, movements and mysteries. Leave your village to uncover the wonders and secrets hidden beneath the mist.
Play as Ixe, a young boy living in a remote mountain village. All around it, everything is shrouded in mist, and danger seems to lurk behind. It is said that an ancient creature named Kamaska created this barrier of mist to protect your village. Eager to explore and discover the world, Ixe can’t stand still forever. Fortunately, old lady Granny will help you discover what really lies beneath the mist.
